title: Is it possible to report players for sending spam links??
body:
Hello community,
I often receive spam links from people of my friend list. Is it possible to report them, just to pretect other people from getting hacked?? Can theier accound get banned?? Thank for all awnsers!

replies.body: If they're sending you possibly malicious links, I'd suggest taking a screenshot and sending that over in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). After that, make sure you unfriend them and block them so they don't keep sending you harmful links.
